00041 NxVec3 Alignment::Execute(AgentInfoPtr aInfo)
00042 {
00043         
00044         NxVec3 distance(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00045         NxVec3 velocitySum(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00046         float w = 1.0f;
00047         // iterate through the neighboring agents
00048         NiTListIterator it = GameManager::Get()->GetAgents().GetHeadPos();
00049         for (int i=0; i<GameManager::Get()->GetAgents().GetSize(); i++)
00050         {
00051                 AgentPtr agent = GameManager::Get()->GetAgents().Get(it);
00052                 AgentInfoPtr otherAgent = agent->GetController()->GetAgentInfo();
00053                 // if this is the current agent then move on to the next one
00054                 if (otherAgent == aInfo)
00055                 {
00056                         it = GameManager::Get()->GetAgents().GetNextPos(it);
00057                         continue;
00058                 }
00059                 // check if the other agent is in the local neighborhood
00060                 distance = aInfo->m_vPos - otherAgent->m_vPos;
00061                 if (distance.magnitude() <= m_fcKNeighborhood)
00062                 {
00063                         // increase the number of agents found in the neighborhood
00064                         w += 1.0f;
00065                         // increase the sum of velocities
00066                         velocitySum += agent->GetActor()->getLinearVelocity();
00067                 }
00068                 it = GameManager::Get()->GetAgents().GetNextPos(it);
00069         }
00070 
00071         // compute desired velocity
00072         aInfo->m_vDesiredVelocity = m_fcKAlignment * velocitySum / w;
00073         // compute desired orientation
00074         aInfo->m_vOrientation = aInfo->m_vDesiredVelocity;
00075         aInfo->m_vOrientation.normalize();
00076         // constrain velocity
00077         if (aInfo->m_vDesiredVelocity.magnitude() > aInfo->m_fcMaxVelocity)
00078         {
00079                 aInfo->m_vDesiredVelocity = aInfo->m_vOrientation * aInfo->m_fcMaxVelocity;
00080         }
00081         // return desired velocity
00082         return aInfo->m_vDesiredVelocity;
00083 }
